title: Sunday
description: When good girl Gia and bad boy Flynn are forced to work on a project for their psychology class, they quickly learn that they share something in common â€“ a mutual hatred that makes it almost impossible to be in the same room together. But all it takes is one explosive Sunday and an attraction that runs too deep to ignore to turn their worlds - and the way they see each other - upside down.Author's Note: This book contains strong language and sexual content with dark elements, some of which readers may find uncomfortable.
author: Kaia Bennett
